players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Looks like Alice was an early target. We should focus on gathering info before jumping to conclusions. Diana, Charlie — any thoughts on suspicious behavior so far?"
Diana: "I agree with Bob, let's gather more information before jumping to conclusions. Diana and Charlie, have you noticed anything unusual from the mafia's behavior or actions?"
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. We can't afford to wait any longer; arresting him now is the only way to protect the town."
Diana: "Let's keep our cool and not jump to conclusions. We need more evidence before making any accusations."

You: "Charlie, accusing me outright without evidence only makes you look suspicious. Diana and I both want to find the real threat; let's focus on gathering concrete proof rather than baseless accusations."
Charlie: "Bob's deflection only confirms my suspicion. Waiting will cost us more lives. We must vote to arrest Bob now to protect the town."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Looks like Alice was an early target. We should focus on gathering info before jumping to conclusions. Diana, Charlie — any thoughts on suspicious behavior so far?"
Diana: "I agree with Bob, let's gather more information before jumping to conclusions. Diana and Charlie, have you noticed anything unusual from the mafia's behavior or actions?"
You: "Bob is the mafioso. We can't afford to wait any longer; arresting him now is the only way to protect the town."
Diana: "Let's keep our cool and not jump to conclusions. We need more evidence before making any accusations."

Bob: "Charlie, accusing me outright without evidence only makes you look suspicious. Diana and I both want to find the real threat; let's focus on gathering concrete proof rather than baseless accusations."
You: "Bob's deflection only confirms my suspicion. Waiting will cost us more lives. We must vote to arrest Bob now to protect the town."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Bob was arrested
